name: Mr. Capital!
description:
[Made for Ludum Dare in 48 hours]

Mr. Capital! needs all the coins! Every single coin! But there's a problem: he's gotta lug 'em all around... Mr. Capital should buy some pockets! Until then, make your way through the levels and collect all those coins! Will Mr. Capital learn the secret of success? Play and find out!

[CONTROLS]

  • arrow keys to move!
  • "z" to jump!
  • "r" to reset the level!
